io.konik.zugferd.entity

Class TaxRegistration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.konik.zugferd.entity.TaxRegistration

  • public class TaxRegistration
extends Object

    The Tax Registration

    Represents the tax number and its type. The ID.getValue() is value added tax identification number The ID.getSchemeId() is the Tax payer’s number or VAT number according to (UNCL 1153) eg. FC or VA
